definitions: If you describe an object as unwieldy, you mean that it is difficult to move or carry because it is so big or heavy.
If you describe a system as unwieldy, you mean that it does not work very well as a result of it being too large or badly organized.
too heavy, large, or awkwardly shaped to be easily handled
hard to wield, manage, handle, or deal with, as because of large size or weight, or awkward form
